main.text: Resolution made and passed by the Legislative Council under section 29 of the Public Finance Ordinance on 14 March 1990.
main.leadIn: Resolved that with effect from 1 April 1990—

paragraph.content: there shall be established a fund to be called the Loan Fund;
the Fund shall be administered by the Financial Secretary who may delegate his power of administration to other public officers;

paragraph.leadIn: there shall be credited to the Fund—

subparagraph.name: a
subparagraph.content: all the assets of the Student Loan Fund including any outstanding balances as at 31 March 1990;

subparagraph.name: b
c
d
subparagraph.content: such appropriations from the general revenue as may be approved by the Legislative Council for the purpose of the Fund;

subparagraph.name: e
subparagraph.leadIn: all sums received by way of repayment of—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: any loan made from the Student Loan Fund;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: any loan or advance specified in the Schedule;

subparagraph.name: iii
subparagraph.content: any loan or advance made from the Fund under paragraph 6;

subparagraph.name: f
subparagraph.leadIn: all sums received by way of interest or dividend on—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: any loan made from the Student Loan Fund;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: any loan or advance specified in the Schedule;

subparagraph.name: iii
subparagraph.content: any loan or advance made from the Fund under paragraph 6;

subparagraph.name: iv
subparagraph.content: any sum invested under paragraph 8;

subparagraph.name: g
subparagraph.content: all sums received from the sale or other disposal of all or part of any investment made under paragraph 8;

subparagraph.name: h
subparagraph.content: all such other sums as may be received for the purpose of the Fund;

subparagraph.name: a
subparagraph.content: all the deposits of the Student Loan Fund as at 31 March 1990; and

subparagraph.name: b
subparagraph.content: all the deposits of the Development Loan Fund as at 31 March 1990;

subparagraph.name: a
subparagraph.content: all the liabilities of the Student Loan Fund in respect of schemes approved by the Finance Committee as at 31 March 1990 for the purpose of granting loans to students out of the Student Loan Fund;

subparagraph.name: b
subparagraph.content: all the liabilities of the Development Loan Fund in respect of schemes approved by the Finance Committee as at 31 March 1990 for the purpose of financing loans and advances out of the Development Loan Fund; and

subparagraph.name: c

paragraph.leadIn: the Financial Secretary may expend moneys from the Fund for the purpose of—

subparagraph.name: a
subparagraph.content: meeting the liabilities in respect of deposits assumed under paragraph 4 and the liabilities assumed under paragraph 5 under terms and conditions already approved by the Finance Committee as at 31 March 1990; and

subparagraph.name: b

paragraph.content: the Student Loan Fund shall be closed.
